price: 41. Dhageyso Maalinka markuu dhawaaquhu ka dhawaaqi meel dhow.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
